experiment: all-forcing simulation of the recent past
grid: All grid attributes are set for the native grid and based on information from attribute source.
institution: Alfred Wegener Institute, Helmholtz Centre for Polar and Marine Research, Am Handelshafen 12, 27570 Bremerhaven, Germany
source:
AWI-CM 1.1 MR (2018): 
aerosol: none
atmos: ECHAM6.3.04p1 (T127L95 native atmosphere T127 gaussian grid; 384 x 192 longitude/latitude; 95 levels; top level 80 km)
atmosChem: none
land: JSBACH 3.20
landIce: none
ocean: FESOM 1.4 (unstructured grid in the horizontal with 830305 wet nodes; 46 levels; top grid cell 0-5 m)
ocnBgchem: none
seaIce: FESOM 1.4
title: AWI-CM-1-1-MR output prepared for CMIP6
